      • UFace

        public UFace(UGeometry _parent,
     int[] id)
        Constructor for cases when a face belongs to a UGeometry instance. Stores vertex IDs then populates the v array with UVec3 pointers to the matching vertex instances.
        Parameters:
        _parent -
        id - Array of vertex IDs

      • UFace

        public UFace(UVec3 fv1,
     UVec3 fv2,
     UVec3 fv3)
        Constructor for creating UFace instances without a UGeometry instance. Does not store vertex indices>, only the UVec3 vertex data.
        Parameters:
        fv1 -
        fv2 -
        fv3 -

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(UFace o)
        Compares this instance to another UFace instance. Uses vertex indices if they exist, if not UVec3.equals() is used to compare vertices.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<UFace>
